mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id_1, b.id AS id_2, a.tournament_id, a.home_id, a.away_id, a.scheduled, a.bet188_id, b.betradar_id FROM ( SELECT rp.id, rp.tournament_id, rp.home_id, rp.away_id, rp.scheduled, rp.bet188_id FROM inno_odds.refactor_prematch rp INNER JOIN sport_info.tournaments t ON rp.tournament_id = t.id INNER JOIN sport_info.categories c3 ON t.category_id = c3.id WHERE rp.sport_id = #{sportId} AND rp.scheduled_date = #{date} AND rp.betradar_id is null AND c3.id NOT IN (705, 801) ) AS a INNER JOIN ( SELECT rp.id, rp.tournament_id, rp.home_id, rp.away_id, rp.scheduled, rp.betradar_id FROM inno_odds.refactor_prematch rp INNER JOIN sport_info.tournaments t ON rp.tournament_id = t.id INNER JOIN sport_info.categories c3 ON t.category_id = c3.id WHERE rp.sport_id = #{sportId} AND rp.scheduled_date = #{date} AND rp.bet188_id is null AND c3.id NOT IN (705, 801) ) AS b ON a.tournament_id = b.tournament_id AND a.home_id = b.home_id AND a.away_id = b.away_id AND a.scheduled = b.scheduled ORDER BY a.tournament_id ASC;
